column2: Therefore one has to read the ratio of Sinniah Nadarajah (supra)  subject to what has been
quite correctly stated in De Mel and Another v.  Rev.  Somaloka (supra).  The principles of

column1: Sinniah  Nadarajah  will  not  apply  in  a  civil  case  where
